description technical detail:
NEC MultiSync E224Wi - 22" - LED-Backlit LCD Monitor
Take your environmental initiatives to the next level with the 23" NEC MultiSync E231W, a widescreen LCD desktop monitor that enhances your desktop computing with bar-setting, eco-friendly benefits. The E231W features an LED-backlit panel that provides the same brightness as other panel types while using 35% less power.
Compared to previous generation NEC LCDs, this model consumes less power overall, radiates less heat, uses less packaging, weighs less, utilizes recycled plastics in its production and is free of hazardous materials such as mercury, halogen and arsenic.
These advantages, combined with an ergonomic design and a high-contrast screen, make this model ideal for enterprise environments.- LED backlight technology provides for low power consumption, improved recyclability and a design free of toxins such as mercury- 4-way ergonomic design (110mm height-adjust, pivot, tilt & swivel) enhances your viewing comfort- DisplayPort provides enhanced display connectivity and performance- ECO ModeTM function and ambient light sensor help save power, reduce heat and extend the life of the display by manually or automatically dimming the brightness level- 25000:1 dynamic contrast ratio delivers amazingly detailed images and text- Carbon footprint meter helps track and calculate the reduction of green gas emissions- Dynamic Video Mode enhances video and images with real-time optimization of brightness, color and contrast
